name: Among Us: Zombie Overflow
description:
After all the imposters have been busted, you and your crewmates are on course for Among Us Planet. However, when your spacecraft is about to reach the planet, you hear a faint croaking noise. Suddenly, one of your crewmates reaches and runs for you. You instinctively kick it away and it dies. Could this be another imposter? No, that’s not possible! All the sussies have been ratted out! An alarm starts blaring. A crewmate jumped out of a room, just to be dragged back by something. After that, 2 crewmates, both green, start attempting to grab you. These must be zombies! You quickly break the navigation system in fear of zombies spreading on your planet. But it’s too late. Your ship crashes onto Among Us Planet. Will you survive or will the zombies get the better of everyone

Controls

WASD - movement

E - Show shop

Mouse - click to shoot and right click to place an item.

Q - Switch Weapons

Scroll - Change selected inventory slot
